casebody.data:
99-0435 (La. 4/1/99)

Lynell SMITH, Daniel Callais, Ronnie Callais, Gene Callais and John Callais, all Individually and on Behalf of their deceased Mother Rita Callais v. ALTON OCHSNER FOUNDATION HOSPITAL and Ochsner Clinic. No. 99-CC-0435. Supreme Court of Louisiana. April 1, 1999.

IN RE: Smith, Lynell Et Al; Calíais, Daniel; Calíais, Ronnie; Calíais, Gene; Calíais, John; — Plaintiff(s); Applying for Supervisory and/or Remedial Writs; Parish of Terrebonne 32nd Judicial District Court Div. “B” Number 122539; to the Court of Appeal, First Circuit, Number CW98 2297

Denied.

KIMBALL, J. not on panel.
